data.text: @PaulFelixKelly @erockvr6 I also believe that bad placebo policy (masks) combined with GOOD policy (vaccines) damages the faith in the good. Notice how flat the US vax rate has been since Omicron. (our potato president lied about the % in his SOTU)
@PaulFelixKelly @erockvr6 IMO masks made things worse from false sense of security. If you can breathe you can infect, period.
@PaulFelixKelly @erockvr6 You do realize even medical masks are mostly for show? To make patients feel safer. Yeah they stop spit and cough but that's about it.

@PaulFelixKelly @erockvr6 Omicron "blew up the mask narrative" for the large cities still mandating them. That's why the CDC only started talking about N95 after Omicron - had to move the goalposts. "Well masks didn't work because they weren't TRUE socialism, I mean masks..."
@PaulFelixKelly @benheck Maybe think outside of your country lines for once. The fear mongering HERE required any mask as long as everyone felt safe

@PaulFelixKelly @erockvr6 We've had nearly of year of about half masked US. Tons of test states/cities to compare to the controls. In my state 2 test counties against 70 control. The rate last fall/Omicron was the same. Masking policy didn't work.

@erockvr6 @benheck The fuck you talking about ? Medical Masks work which have been standard here in germany for at least 2 years now, Im not sure if your put a stinky sock in your mouth gonna help you but this isnt the point.
@PaulFelixKelly @benheck Pretty sure doctors aren't wearing cut up t-shirts or surplus Joann fabrics on their face just to make people feel safe

@benheck @erockvr6 And as an FYI Im not from america so why do we Germans also needed to wear masks ? Are you gonna tell me that there is a global elite doing that shit or aliens ? For the love of god please inform yourself on those things and try to think further then your own state line for once.

@benheck @erockvr6 Ben are you telling me that the thousands of studies that tell us that masks are effective are lies that doctors have been wearing them for shits and giggles until now ? You telling me that the data is real whilst picking out the 1 or 2 things that can support your argument.
